title: Three cows
creator_credit: Gavin Bannerman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Gavin Bannerman grew up on a farm out of Brisbane. The Bannermans had a deal with the local butcher for their cattle and every season they would either have a fridge full of meat or a tidy sum. One day, they decided to name their cows.
